    The VehicleManagementSystem is a system that manages the mass of vehicles and their components. It contains a Vehicle, which is composed of multiple components, each of which has a mass. The total mass of a vehicle is the sum of its own mass and the mass of all its components. The system supports recursive composition of components and mass filtering. It includes a threshold that only includes subcomponents with mass greater than or equal to the specified value. Each component has a unique serial number, while the complete vehicle has a unique Vehicle Identification Number (VIN). The system also includes key subcomponents such as the engine and transmission, which can be specifically defined along with their masses. The system provides a clear and straightforward overview of the total vehicle mass, enabling precise mass management for vehicles and their constituent components.

The "Car" class has a single attribute "Torque" which is of type "TorqueValue". The "TorqueValue" class has a single attribute "value" which is of type "Real".
